title: NCIS: Sydney Boss Breaks Down (Sweaty!) Finale’s Fraught Closing Moments, Teases ‘Bigger’ Season 3
description: The following contains spoilers from the Season 2 finale of NCIS: Sydney, which aired April 25 on CBS. title: The Andor Characters Missing From Rogue One: Who Do You Predict Dies in Season 2? Who Will Survive? Vote!
